title: The Russian Girl Sitting Next to Me Is a Kisser - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Cohabitation   Forced Living Arrangements   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Sakurai Masamune
description:
The Russian girl sitting next to me stares at me.

I, Oojirou, am a distant relative of Lydia, the silver-haired Russian girl who transferred to our school and is known as the “Ice Lady”. My parents asked me to take care of Lydia, and for some reason we even started living together.

Somehow, she’s taken a liking to me and I’m getting kissed by her every day.

This is the beginning of my sweet life with a russian girl.>
